SEARCH
程序包 com.virtualbankv2.boundary

类 Reader

java.lang.Object
com.virtualbankv2.boundary.Reader
public class Reader extends Object
The Reader class provides methods to read data from CSV files and populate lists of various entities, such as users, accounts, transactions, tasks, goals, and support information.
从以下版本开始:
2024-04-14
版本:
9.0
作者:
Zhenghan Zhong

    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    static List<Account>
    accounts
    List to store all account information.
    static List<Goal>
    goals
    List to store all long-term goals set by users.
    static List<Interest>
    interests
    List to store Interest information.
    static List<SupportSystem>
    support
    List to store user support and help information.
    static List<Task>
    tasks
    List to store all tasks set by parents.
    static List<Transaction>
    transactions
    List to store all transaction records of accounts.
    static List<User>
    users
    List to store all user account information.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Reader

      public Reader()
      Constructs a Reader object and initializes lists by reading data from CSV files. Reads data for users, accounts, transactions, tasks, goals, and support information.

  • 方法详细资料

    • readUsers

      public List<User> readUsers(String filePath)
      Reads user data from a CSV file and populates a list of User objects.
      参数:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file containing user data.
      返回:
      A list of User objects populated with data from the CSV file.

    • readAccounts

      public List<Account> readAccounts(String filePath)
      Reads account data from a CSV file and populates a list of Account objects.
      参数:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file containing account data.
      返回:
      A list of Account objects populated with data from the CSV file.

    • readGoals

      public List<Goal> readGoals(String filePath)
      Reads goal data from a CSV file and populates a list of Goal objects.
      参数:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file containing goal data.
      返回:
      A list of Goal objects populated with data from the CSV file.

    • readTasks

      public List<Task> readTasks(String filePath)
      Reads task data from a CSV file and populates a list of Task objects.
      参数:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file containing task data.
      返回:
      A list of Task objects populated with data from the CSV file.

    • readSupport

      public List<SupportSystem> readSupport(String filePath)
      Reads support information from a CSV file and populates a list of SupportSystem objects.
      参数:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file containing support information.
      返回:
      A list of SupportSystem objects populated with data from the CSV file.

    • readTransactions

      public List<Transaction> readTransactions(String filePath)
      Reads transaction data from a CSV file and populates a list of Transaction objects.
      参数:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file containing transaction data.
      返回:
      A list of Transaction objects populated with data from the CSV file.

    • readInterests

      public List<Interest> readInterests(String filePath)
      Reads interest data from a CSV file and populates a list of interest objects.
      参数:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file containing interest data.
      返回:
      A list of Interest objects populated with data from the CSV file.

    • readTotalCounter

      public static int readTotalCounter(String filePath)
      Reads the total counter value from the last line of the CSV file. If no data is found or an error occurs, the total counter is set to 0.
      参数:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file.
      返回:
      The total counter value read from the last line of the CSV file, or 0 if no data is found or an error occurs.
